mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD LIKE '%' || #{fword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_DATE(#{postday},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(1) and NCHR(45207)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(45208) and NCHR(45795)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(45796) and NCHR(46971)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(46972) and NCHR(47559)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(47560) and NCHR(48147)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(48148) and NCHR(49323)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(49324) and NCHR(50499)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(50500) and NCHR(51087)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(51088) and NCHR(52263)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(52264) and NCHR(52851)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(52852) and NCHR(53439)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(53440) and NCHR(54027)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(54028) and NCHR(54615)
SELECT * FROM FORBIDDEN WHERE FORBIDDEN_WORD BETWEEN NCHR(54616) and NCHR(55203)
SELECT * FROM NEEZ_USER
SELECT * FROM WITHDRAW ORDER BY USER_WITHDRAW_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WITHDRAW ORDER BY USER_WITHDRAW_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM BUYLIST WHERE USER_BUY_REFUND = 'Y'
AND USER_BUY_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_DATE(#{postday},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
AND USER_BUY_MASTER = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC
AND USER_EMAIL = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC
AND USER_BUY_TITLE = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUYLIST WHERE USER_BUY_REFUND = 'Y'
AND USER_BUY_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_DATE(#{postday},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
AND USER_BUY_MASTER = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC
AND USER_EMAIL = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC
AND USER_BUY_TITLE = #{searchBox} ORDER BY USER_BUY_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM NEEZ_MASTER

SELECT * FROM USER_ACCESS
WHERE USER_EMAIL LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE MASTER_RANKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE #{search_box}
AND
WHERE
AND
WHERE
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-15,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-4),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-7),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_CHAR(#{postday})
ORDER BY USER_ACCESS_NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM USER_ACCESS
WHERE USER_EMAIL LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE MASTER_RANKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE #{search_box}
AND
WHERE
AND
WHERE
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-15,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-4),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-7),'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.99999,'YYYY.MM.DD')
ACCESS_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_CHAR(#{postday})
ORDER BY USER_ACCESS_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM NEEZ_USER NU LEFT JOIN NEEZ_MASTER NM ON (NU.USER_EMAIL = NM.USER_EMAIL) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_EMAIL, MAX(ACCESS_DATE) AS ACCESS_DATE FROM USER_ACCESS GROUP BY USER_EMAIL ) NEW ON NU.USER_EMAIL = NEW.USER_EMAIL
WHERE NU.USER_EMAIL LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NM.MASTER_RANKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NU.USER_NAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NM.MASTER_NICKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
AND
WHERE
NU.USER_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_DATE(#{postday},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N')
AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y'
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL) AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N'
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND MASTER_RANKNAME IN
#{a}

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM NEEZ_USER NU LEFT JOIN NEEZ_MASTER NM ON (NU.USER_EMAIL = NM.USER_EMAIL) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_EMAIL, MAX(ACCESS_DATE) AS ACCESS_DATE FROM USER_ACCESS GROUP BY USER_EMAIL ) NEW ON NU.USER_EMAIL = NEW.USER_EMAIL
WHERE NU.USER_EMAIL LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NM.MASTER_RANKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NU.USER_NAME LIKE #{search_box}
WHERE NM.MASTER_NICKNAME LIKE #{search_box}
AND
WHERE
NU.USER_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{preday}) AND TO_DATE(#{postday},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N')
AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y'
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL) AND NU.USER_STATUS = 'N'
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND (MASTER_NICKNAME IS NULL OR MASTER_NICKNAME IS NOT NULL OR NU.USER_STATUS = 'Y')
AND MASTER_RANKNAME IN
#{a}

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM NEEZ_USER NU LEFT JOIN NEEZ_MASTER NM ON (NU.USER_EMAIL = NM.USER_EMAIL) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_EMAIL, MAX(ACCESS_DATE) AS ACCESS_DATE FROM USER_ACCESS GROUP BY USER_EMAIL ) NEW ON NU.USER_EMAIL = NEW.USER_EMAIL
SELECT FORBIDDEN_WORD FROM FORBIDDEN
